WaveNight.Night_Start_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="314d6d9b98ab4041a32d61ac9de65e36" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Watch for creatures out there, new blood.
WaveNight.Night_Start_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f3eddca82a614b5db7471e724a71080e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]About the Glow Pikmin... You'll need more.
WaveNight.Night_Start_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="36c3635912e54ed4a53a737051b5c576" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Protect that Lumiknoll with all you've got.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1c72050f0b2f48159a34926701fdba5c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Gather a lot of Glow Pikmin.
It'll make protecting the Lumiknoll easier.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1ea9bcb13de7426ab841038ee72330e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Frenzied creatures go for the Lumiknoll.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c080130754ad4307a6cd9499777ff4d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Don't forget about [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Glowmobs[System:Color name="Default"]!
They're very effective against creatures!
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="adda7d97d11b4cd08f29513fbbc88186" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Try using Tricknolls as [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]lures[System:Color name="Default"], eheheh.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="d9087fd455cd408699a398a8da00d89b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]night radar[System:Color name="Default"] display is quite handy.
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Use it to verify[System:Color name="Default"] the Lumiknoll's location.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_05: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="eb49fe3b1be24cb9986d6ef50661005c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Frenzied creatures will [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]be red[System:Color name="Default"] on the radar.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="26e4e00b015c4175bee4876f402bd901" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Grammar:Cap/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]items[System:Color name="Default"] in your pack are there to be used.
Don't let them go to waste.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_07: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="64aa79119f0945e492c99da95574b1ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Have [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] help protect the Lumiknoll.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_08: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6c7ce8ffe6194868bf744f45899a7ad2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Use [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Glow Seeds[System:Color name="Default"] to get more Glow Pikmin.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_09: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="25f223e511e5475bb0a9dc7ed1970b75" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Try switching to divide up roles.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="70338dde45e545e3b2e16baf384f1415" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Have your partner go to the Lumiknoll.[System:Color name="Default"]
Use a Command to send them there.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="51e2f00fe7cb4c2d9ebc46a018a7442d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Got two Lumiknolls?
Split up to protect them both.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="2079dc98dabb4f0da05285e72c899bf3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Defeat creatures before they're frenzied.
It's a good strategy, eh, new blood?
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4b268fd0633341adacf2c88de879df36" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Don't mourn lost Glow Pikmin.
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]They go to the Lumiknoll as beads of light.
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPLow_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0e5684c9edd04326ac5dc1f5b98c7c3b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Every night has an end. Hang in there.
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPHi_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5416b0302fbc49cd925d89ce42ef0e0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It's not over yet!
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPHi_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c4e6b9ef56004505a3e08ab0a673907d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Morning can't come soon enough, can it?
WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="53ac734631bf42bd83adb8f5a02fcd66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Don't take your eyes off the Lumiknoll!
WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="ef34a0d9838f48ce830777f5c24b4905" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Track creatures using your [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]night radar[System:Color name="Default"].
It's at the bottom of your screen.
WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c882faab539b4a13bf565cf0f52dcb93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Think you have enough Glow Pikmin?
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="a8612a770fa8474aacb3eec0c8a70958" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Protect the Lumiknoll, new blood.
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="b580a64b7a7a44aaa9ae3a3c178aee83" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Work with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] on a solid defense!
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="d259e4c2d0b34dd0b54c088bf665e626" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Gather the Glow Pikmin you need first.
Focus on protecting after that.
WaveNight.Night_InvasionGensei_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4490532de2c64a14935d6d1a2c4183bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The creatures are starting to perk up.
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You better protect the Lumiknoll, eheheh.
WaveNight.Night_InvasionGensei_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1ed55af054494073a59f5e368764a745" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]The creatures are getting more active...
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Don't let them destroy the Lumiknoll!
WaveNight.Night_Announce_InvasionWasurena:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4eecba2dd5e14c5f8545412ac32b1142" Scale="0.9692132"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]The [Carrot:HitHikaridukaName/] is under attack!
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Don't let it get destroyed!
WaveNight.Night_Announce_InvasionWasurena_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="bdd47c3ca7094adda5916489fc98fb28" Scale="0.9289618"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]They're attacking the [Carrot:HitHikaridukaName/]!
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Hurry! Stop the creatures!
WaveNight.Night_Announce_InvasionWasurena_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="128ac0a9313c4450a36ccf169a3f50e1" Scale="0.9279476"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]The [Carrot:HitHikaridukaName/] is being attacked!
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Quick, you have to protect it!
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Discovery_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="0d289d81b7ce4d4aab464c0a66d3b267" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hmm, look how it lit up, eheheh.
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Under_Attack_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="499dd4f2b06843da8ef71c3c4941d4b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]They're attacking a Tricknoll, new blood.
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Under_Attack_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="6e00addd510d4d2d8fd20bd847dcf603" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]A Tricknoll is being attacked.
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Under_Attack_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0050ecc827754c3880da163e036c65f4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Uh, the creatures... The Tricknoll...
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Broken_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="89566f874de94e0485764ba2e85fcd18" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Looks like the Tricknoll was destroyed.
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Broken_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="539b1fe553ee4c5fac27fe9a3f6e8a41" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]They destroyed the Tricknoll, huh...
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Broken_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a3b6d139d7a8442a9e7bb3532ec0c083" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]The Tricknoll was wiped out...
WaveNight.Night_HurryUp_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="cf2b15a1e97d4f93b89f53aae0d48ee0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The night's nearly over.
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You're almost there, new blood.
WaveNight.Night_HurryUp_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5b872f5a0a774870b61041be6c90e485" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Just a short time till sunrise!
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]You can make it!
WaveNight.Night_DogDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="6960a91d798f40eb9c06fb28bdb0e27c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Blasteroids! [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is out.
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/][Grammar:Cap/][Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/], take care of him!
WaveNight.Night_SeijinDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="8f2af67a4d8c43568b8325eb5a9cdcc1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]You alright, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Please rest up until [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] wakes you.
WaveNight.Night_FirstDeadHikariPikmin: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="219be60e51274f5786583d15ef753fc5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]You lost a Glow Pikmin, new blood.
WaveNight.Night_HikariPikmin_AttributeDamage: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6f6dd9d0962b4df3ab779c78577eba74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]What's this? The Glow Pikmin are fine.
WaveNight.Night_EncountChappy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f3ca31d8ac8845eb9374d7c1768846ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That's a sizable creature there.
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Use a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Glowmob[System:Color name="Default"] with [PictureFont:IconData key="FlashBang" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/] to stun it!
WaveNight.Night_Underwater_HikariStation: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="b93ece3af4d94ca4ae1e2da7696c0113" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]There are glow pellets in the water too?
WaveNight.Night_EncountTateanaBaby:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1513fe331f974f388a8d10e17186166f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You've gotta crush the source, new blood!
Otherwise, they'll just keep on coming.
